system.description:
At the end of the long road you have chosen to walk is power and purpose. You have seized the former in service to the latter and woe betide those who would oppose you. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Intelligence or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • Half your wizard levels count as herald levels for the purpose of gaining the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.b6bbf481xmj9mi6u]{Extra Attack} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.u220f22b3cpphtgb]{Empowered Smite} features.
  • Half your herald levels count as wizard levels for the purpose of gaining the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.iojeid79x6ghgcw9]{Signature Spells} feature. Additionally, you can choose a herald or wizard spell as your signature spell choice.
  • You gain proficiency with your choice of the Cutting Omen or Sanctified Steel combat traditions and a single maneuver from your chosen tradition of a level you can learn. It does not count against your maneuvers known.
  • You gain the following additional Empowered Smite option:

Arcane Smite

Your smite instead deals force damage, and you can cast a cantrip you know with a casting time of one action with no additional action required. If you drop the target to zero hit points, you can choose to recover a spent first- or second- level spell slot instead of casting a cantrip.
